A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unbelievable plot holes and left me and the 4 friends that saw it feeling robbed by lost chances and unexplained plot limes. TIme spent weaving a new mythology in the first film just dropped. Im stunned that critics like this film\, perhaps they judge it as a Christmas holiday block buster\, better that transformers and the Mummy so lets give it a big thumbs up but to starwars fans this is a very disappointing outing. I want to outline the pile of errors\, plot holes\, dropped chances but they are all spoilers . I have Rogue one to hold onto ... thats something and hopefully 'Solo' will be another cracking film to help paper over this lost cause
